price: Gooftaa kee faarsuu wajjin Isa qulqulleessi, Warra sujuudan irraa ta’i.
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
